decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement, Flood Risk Assessment, STGG-LP, STGG-BP, STGG-PHI, STGG-01, STGG-02, STGG-03, STGG-04, STGG-05, STGG-06 Received: 06 January 2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The extension [building] hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as [44 Staveley Gardens, Chiswick W4 2SA].

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Retrospective planning permission outbuilding in rear garden
